title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! May 13th thru May
description:
Expanding the Consciousness of the entire planet! Coast to Coast AM with George Norry! Download, SEED, and Enjoy! Until next week.... Stokeman Out.....


Tuesday May 13th, 2008
Exopolitics, ETs & the Vatican
In a special evening on the subject of &#039;exopolitics,&#039; several guests reacted to the Vatican&#039;s comments about aliens (see below), and the UK&#039;s release of UFO files. In the second hour, UFO journalist Paola Harris noted the quotes that Rev. Funes made... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Brian Greene, Michael E. Salla, Alfred Webre, Paola Harris, Richard C. Hoagland

Wednesday May 14th, 2008
The Influence of Randomness
Appearing in the middle two hours, physicist and writer Leonard Mlodinow spoke about his recent studies on randomness, and the influence it has in our daily lives. The title of his new book, The Drunkard&#039;s Walk, refers to the idea that we often end...
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Leonard Mlodinow, Richard C. Hoagland

Thursday May 15th, 2008
Un-Natural Disasters & Giants
Author and expert in survivalism Steve Quayle discussed how disasters such as the Chinese quake, the Myanmar cyclone, and the tornadoes in the U.S. have been coming fast and furious. He suggested that some of these events could be caused by weather... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Steve Quayle, Leo Laporte, Douglas Hagmann

Friday May 16th, 2008
Trilogy Hotline
During Open Lines, George offered a different special topic line each hour. A former Hospital Corpsman in the U.S. Navy phoned into the &#039;Bug Stories&#039; line to share a story about his encounter with an alien that looked like a giant praying mantis. According... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Open Lines, Anthony Carr

Saturday May 17th, 2008
Generations & Crisis Cycles
Historian and economist Neil Howe discussed his work on generations and how they shape history as well as cycles of crisis. According to Howe, there are four different types of generations -- Boomers, Generation X, Millennial and Lost -- that have tended...
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Neil Howe, Galen Cook, Tudor Parfitt, Kristi Piehl

Sunday May 18th, 2008
Mad Cow Disease in America
George Knapp (email) was joined by former cattle rancher turned vegetarian and food safety activist, Howard Lyman. People don&#039;t have a clue about the seriousness of Mad Cow Disease (called CJD in humans), and as many as 450,000 Americans may have the... 
Host: George Knapp
Guest(s): Howard Lyman, John Lear

Monday May 19th, 2008
Angelic Communications
Angel communicator Ann Albers discussed mystical dimensions, evolved spiritual beings, and demonic entities. Angels are like the nerve signals of the universe, and can be thought of as frequency beings, she said. Demons, in contrast, are disconnected... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Ann Albers, Jim Berkland, Jerome Corsi, Deborah Pratt

Tuesday May 20th, 2008
Flex Fuel Mandate
Appearing during the middle two hours, aerospace engineer Robert Zubrin shared his strategy for reducing dependence on foreign oil. If the oil cartels&#039; profits continue at the current rate, they will eventually be worth more than the entire Fortune 500,... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Dr. Robert Zubrin, Robert Felix

Wednesday May 21st, 2008
Ghosts & the Spirit World
Celebrated medium James Van Praagh returned for a discussion on his encounters with ghosts and the spirit world, as well as his psychic intuitions. Everyone is mediumistic to some extent and can channel energy from the spiritual dimension or their... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): James Van Praagh, Barrie Schwortz
